We transform spaces into functional, aesthetically refined environments.

About.metaDescription: Designed by Emerald is an interior design studio focused on creating elegant, functional and timeless spaces.
About.title: Every detail, from concept to completion
About.body: Designed by Emerald is a comprehensive solutions provider specialising in interior design, engineering systems, and facility management. Based in the UAE, we deliver end-to-end solutions that integrate creative design with technical precision.

vision.heading: Vision
vision.body: To be a leading force in the construction and building management industry, recognized for <bold>innovation, quality, and sustainability</bold>. We aspire to set new benchmarks in design, engineering, and facility management — redefining how spaces are built, managed, and experienced.

mission.heading: Mission
mission.body: To deliver exceptional construction, fit-out, and building management solutions by combining <bold>technical expertise with creative innovation</bold>. We are dedicated to exceeding client expectations through precision, quality craftsmanship, and sustainable practices while creating environments that are functional, inspiring, and built to last. We focus on practical and long-lasting design solutions, carefully considering space planning, materials, lighting, and detail — ensuring each project is tailored, practical, and enduring.

innovation.heading: Innovation
innovation.body: Innovation is at the heart of everything we do. We embrace cutting-edge technology, smart design, and forward-thinking solutions to enhance efficiency, sustainability, and performance in building management, fit-out work, and electrotechnical services.

smart.title: Smart Building Solutions
smart.description: Integrating automation, IoT, and AI for seamless operation and energy efficiency.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Practices and Environmental Stewardship
sustainable.description: We are at the forefront of implementing eco-friendly materials, energy-saving systems, and green technologies.

construction.title: Advanced Construction Methods
construction.description: Utilizing modular designs, prefabrication, and digital modeling for precision and speed.

customized.title: Customized Solutions
customized.description: Tailoring every project to meet the unique needs of our clients with innovative problem-solving.

hse.title: Health, Safety, and Environmental Commitment
hse.body: At DBE, we prioritise health, safety, and environmental responsibility in every project. Our strict safety protocols, regular risk assessments, and employee training ensure a secure working environment for all. We integrate green building practices, use sustainable materials, and focus on energy efficiency to minimise our environmental impact. By embracing eco-friendly solutions and maintaining high standards of health and safety, we create spaces that are both safe and sustainable for the future.

Privacy.metaDescription: Privacy policy for Designed by Emerald. How we handle your data in compliance with UAE Federal Decree-Law No. 45 of 2021 (PDPL).
Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.body: At Designed by Emerald, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with the UAE Personal Data Protection Law (Federal Decree-Law No. 45 of 2021).
Privacy.whoWeAreBody: Designed by Emerald is an interior design studio based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Our registered office is at The Meydan Hotel, Dubai.
Privacy.dataCollectBody: We collect minimal data to improve your experience on our website:
Privacy.analyticsBody: We use Vercel Web Analytics, which collects anonymous, aggregated page-view data. This includes page URLs, referrer URLs, browser type, and country-level geolocation. No personally identifiable information (PII) is collected, and no cookies are used for tracking.
Privacy.commBody: When you contact us via WhatsApp or email, we receive the information you choose to share. This is processed solely for responding to your enquiry.
Privacy.legalBasisBody: We process your data based on the following lawful grounds under the UAE PDPL:
Privacy.consentBody: Analytics data is only collected after you explicitly consent via our cookie banner.
Privacy.legitimateBody: Responding to enquiries you initiate via WhatsApp or email.
Privacy.howWeUseItem1: To understand how visitors use our website and improve its performance
Privacy.howWeUseItem2: To respond to your enquiries about our interior design services
Privacy.howWeUseBody: We do not sell, share, or transfer your personal data to any third parties for marketing purposes.
Privacy.retentionBody: Analytics data is retained by Vercel for a maximum of 30 days. Communication records (WhatsApp and email) are retained only for as long as necessary to fulfil the purpose of your enquiry.
Privacy.rightsBody: Under the UAE PDPL, you have the right to:
Privacy.rightsWithdraw: To withdraw analytics consent, clear your browser's local storage for this website, or contact us directly.
Privacy.transfersBody: Vercel Analytics data may be processed outside the UAE. Vercel maintains appropriate data protection standards in accordance with their privacy policy and applicable regulations.
Privacy.contactUsBody: For any privacy-related enquiries or to exercise your rights, please contact us:
Privacy.changesBody: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
